title: Montessori Toys for 1 to 3-Year-Old Boys Girls Toddlers, Wooden Sorting & Stacking Toys for Toddlers and Kids Preschool, Educational Toys, Color Recognition Stacker Shape Sorter, Learning Puzzles Gift
raw_desc: This wooden sorting and stacking puzzle contains 20 pieces including blocks of 5 colors and 5 geometric shapes Kids can sort by shape, color or by the numbers of holes for pegs Perfect for your child to learn shape and geometry, build color recognition and enhance kids hand-eye coordination ability Great toddler toy for 2 to 4-year-old boys and girls
features: This wooden sorting and stacking puzzle contains 20 pieces including blocks of 5 colors and 5 geometric shapes
